channel.title: "java.net socket exception: software caused connection abort" what is that
channel.description:
[code] java.net socket exception: software caused connection abort [/code]
my hoster can host for like.. 20 mins. no lag BUT randomly.. that error jus comes up and kills teh server. after.. like.. 7-16 people get on on and bam it happens. it can be a while.. or the second a certain number logs in anyone got any ideas?
this is in the runserv btw

item.title: "java.net socket exception: software caused connection abort" what is that

item.description:
@awesom wrote:

Means you got a virus [size=1pt]jk=][/size]
